package com.zzy.stringbuffer_;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class StringBuferMethod {    public static void main(String[] args) {        StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer("hello");        //å°¾æ’        stringBuffer.append(",");        stringBuffer.append("å¼ ä¸‰ä¸°");        stringBuffer.append("å¼ æ— å¿Œ").append(100).append(true).append(10.5);        System.out.println(stringBuffer);        //åˆ é™¤        stringBuffer.delete(12, 15);        System.out.println(stringBuffer);//å‰é—­åå¼€        //ä¿®æ”¹        stringBuffer.replace(9,12,"å‘¨èŠ·è‹¥");        System.out.println(stringBuffer);        //æŸ¥æ‰¾        int num = stringBuffer.indexOf("å¼ ä¸‰ä¸°");        System.out.println(num);        //æ’å…¥,åœ¨ç´¢å¼•ä¸º9çš„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥ï¼ŒåŸæ¥ç´¢å¼•ä¸º9çš„å†…å®¹è‡ªåŠ¨åç§»        stringBuffer.insert(9, "æ“");        System.out.println(stringBuffer);        //é•¿åº¦        System.out.println(stringBuffer.length());    }}

package com.zzy.math_;import com.sun.jdi.DoubleValue;import java.sql.SQLOutput;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class MathMethod {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //Mathå¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•        //abs ç»å¯¹å€¼        int abs = Math.abs(-2);        System.out.println(abs);        //pow æ±‚å¹‚        double pow = Math.pow(2, 3);        System.out.println(pow);        //ceil å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´ è¿”å›æœ€å°æ•´æ•°ï¼ˆè½¬æˆdouble)        double ceil = Math.ceil(- 3.1);        System.out.println(ceil);        //floor å‘ä¸‹å–æ•´,åæ ‡è½´å³è¾¹ä¸ºä¸Š,(è£…æˆdouble)        double floor = Math.floor(-3.1);        System.out.println(floor);        //round å››èˆäº”å…¥        long round = Math.round(4.5);        System.out.println(round);        //å¼€æ–¹        double x = Math.sqrt(10);        System.out.println(x);        //è¿”å›éšæœºæ•°,è¿”å›[0, 1)çš„æ•°        double y = Math.random();        double z = Math.floor( y * 6 + 2);        System.out.println(z);        //max, min è¿”å›æœ€å¤§å€¼å’Œæœ€å°å€¼        int min = Math.min(1, 9);        int max = Math.max(45, 90);        System.out.println("max = " + max);        System.out.println("min = " + min);    }}

package com.zzy.array_;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.Comparator;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class ArrayMethod01 {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Integer[] integers = {1, 20, 90};        //Arraysçš„toStringæ–¹æ³•        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(integers));        //æ’åº        Integer[] arr1 = {1, -1, 7, 0, 89};        //å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Arraysæä¾›çš„sortæ–¹æ³•        //æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹,æ‰€ä»¥é€šè¿‡sortæ’åºåï¼Œä¼šç›´æ¥å½±å“åˆ°å®å‚ arr        Arrays.sort(arr1);        System.out.println("æ’åºå...");        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr1));        //å®šåˆ¶æ’åºï¼Œå®ç°äº†Comparatoræ¥å£çš„åŒ¿åå†…éƒ¨ç±»        Arrays.sort(arr1, new Comparator<Integer>() {            @Override            public int compare(Integer o1, Integer o2) {                return o2 -o1;            }        });        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr1));    }}

package com.zzy.array_;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.Comparator;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class ArraySortCustom {    public static void main(String[] args) {        int[] arr = {1, -1, 8, 0, 20 };        bubble_sort01(arr, new Comparator() {            @Override            public int compare(Object o1, Object o2) {                int i1 = (Integer) o1; //å‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹åŠ è‡ªåŠ¨æ‹†ç®±                int i2 = (Integer) o2;                return i1 -i2; //return i2 -i1;            }        });        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));    }    public static void bubble_sort(int[] arr) {        for (int i = 0; i < arr.length ; i++) {            for (int j = i+1; j <arr.length ; j++) {                if ( arr[i] > arr[j]) {                    int temp = arr[i];                    arr[i] = arr[j];                    arr[j] = temp;                }            }        }    }    //ç»“åˆå†’æ³¡ + å®šåˆ¶    public static void bubble_sort01 (int[] arr, Comparator c) {        for (int i = 0; i < arr.length ; i++) {            for (int j = i+1; j <arr.length ; j++) {                //æ•°ç»„çš„æ’åºç”±ifé‡Œçš„è¯­å¥å»æ§åˆ¶                if ( c.compare(arr[i], arr[j]) > 0) {                    int temp = arr[i];                    arr[i] = arr[j];                    arr[j] = temp;                }            }        }    }}
package com.zzy.array_;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.List;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class ArrayMethod02 {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Integer[] arr = {1, 2, 90, 123, 567};        //ä½¿ç”¨binarySearch äºŒå‰æŸ¥æ‰¾ï¼Œè¦æ±‚æ•°ç»„æ˜¯æœ‰åºçš„        //å¦‚æœè¯¥æ•°ç»„æ˜¯æ— åºçš„ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨binarySearch        //å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå°±è¿”å› -(low + 1)ï¼Œlowä»£è¡¨ä»–åº”è¯¥å­˜åœ¨çš„ä½ç½®        int index = Arrays.binarySearch(arr, 568);        System.out.println(index); //-6        //copyOf æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ çš„å¤åˆ¶,ä»arrä¸­æ‹·è´ arr.lengthä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ°newArr        //å¦‚æœæ‹·è´çš„é•¿åº¦ >åŸæ¥æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå°±åœ¨åŸæ¥çš„æ•°ç»„å°¾æ’ä¸€ä¸ªnull        Integer[] newArr = Arrays.copyOf(arr, arr.length + 1);        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(newArr));        //fill æ•°ç»„å¡«å……,ä½¿ç”¨99æ›¿æ¢åŸæ¥çš„æ•°ç»„        Integer[] num = {9, 3, 2};        Arrays.fill(num, 99);        System.out.println("æ•°ç»„å¡«å……å...");        System.out.println(Arrays.toString(num));        //equals æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ å†…å®¹æ˜¯å¦å®Œå…¨ä¸€è‡´,å¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™è¿”å›true        Integer[] arr1 = {1, 2, 90, 123, 567};        boolean bool = Arrays.equals(arr, arr1);        System.out.println(bool);        //asList å°†ä¸€ç»„å€¼ï¼Œè½¬æ¢æˆList, Listæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£        List<Integer> asList = Arrays.asList(2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1);        System.out.println("asList = " + asList);    }}

package com.zzy.bignum_;import java.math.BigInteger;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class bigInteger {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //ç¼–ç¨‹ä¸­å¤„ç†å¾ˆå¤§çš„æ•´æ•°,ç”¨BigInteger        BigInteger bigInteger = new BigInteger("2321546576824343");        System.out.println(bigInteger);        //åœ¨å¯¹BigIntegerè¿›è¡ŒåŠ å‡ä¹˜é™¤çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨å¯¹åº”çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è¿›è¡Œ+ - * /        BigInteger bigInteger1 = new BigInteger("100");        BigInteger add = bigInteger.add(bigInteger1);        System.out.println(add);        BigInteger subtract = bigInteger.subtract(bigInteger1);        System.out.println(subtract);        BigInteger multiply = bigInteger.multiply(bigInteger1);        System.out.println(multiply);        BigInteger divide = bigInteger.divide(bigInteger1);        System.out.println(divide);    }}
package com.zzy.bignum_;import java.math.BigDecimal;import java.math.RoundingMode;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class bigDecimal_ {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //å½“æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä¿å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªç²¾åº¦å¾ˆé«˜çš„æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œdoubleä¸å¤Ÿç”¨        BigDecimal bigDecimal = new BigDecimal("0.3232545465665454325");        System.out.println(bigDecimal);        //å†é™¤ä»¥å°æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ— é™å¾ªç¯çš„å°æ•°ï¼Œä¼šæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸        BigDecimal bigDecimal1 = new BigDecimal("3");        //åœ¨è°ƒç”¨divideæ—¶ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®šç²¾åº¦å°±å¯ä»¥        //å¦‚æœæœ‰æ— é™å¾ªç¯å°æ•°ï¼Œå°±ä¼šä¿ç•™åˆ†å­çš„ç²¾åº¦        bigDecimal = bigDecimal.divide(bigDecimal1, RoundingMode.CEILING);        System.out.println(bigDecimal);    }}

package com.zzy.collection_;import java.util.ArrayList;import java.util.Iterator;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class CollectionIterator {    public static void main(String[] args) {        ArrayList arrayList = new ArrayList();        arrayList.add(new Book("ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰", "ç½—è´¯ä¸­", 19));        arrayList.add(new Book("çº¢æ¥¼æ¢¦", "æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹", 20));        arrayList.add(new Book("è¥¿æ¸¸è®°", "å´ä¸–æ©", 22));        System.out.println(arrayList);        //éå†        Iterator it = arrayList.iterator();        while (it.hasNext()) {            //å› ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½èƒ½å­˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯Object            Object obj = it.next();            System.out.println(obj); //åŠ¨æ€ç»‘å®š        }        //å¦‚æœæƒ³é‡æ–°éå†ï¼Œå°±è¦é‡ç½®è¿­ä»£å™¨        it = arrayList.iterator();        while (it.hasNext()) {            Object next =  it.next();            System.out.println(next);        }    }}class Book {    public String name;    public String author;    public double price;    public Book(String name, String author, double price) {        this.name = name;        this.author = author;        this.price = price;    }    @Override    public String toString() {        return "Book{" +                "name='" + name + '\'' +                ", author='" + author + '\'' +                ", price=" + price +                '}';    }}

package com.zzy.collection_;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class LinkedList01 {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Node jack = new Node("jack");        Node tom = new Node("tom");        Node hsp = new Node("è€éŸ©");        //jack->tom->hsp        //è¿æ¥ä¸‰ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹        jack.next = tom;        tom.next = hsp;        //hsp->tom->jack        hsp.pre = tom;        tom.pre = jack;        Node first = jack;        Node last = hsp;        //ä»å¤´åˆ°å°¾éå†        while (true) {            if (first == null) {//true                break;            }            System.out.println(first);            first = first.next; //tom.next = null;        }        //ä»å°¾åˆ°å¤´éå†        while (true) {            if (last == null) {                break;            }            System.out.println(last);            last = last.pre;        }        //åœ¨tomå’Œå’Œè€éŸ©ä¹‹é—´åŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡        Node zf = new Node("å¼ é£");        tom.next = zf;        zf.next = hsp;        hsp.pre = zf;        zf.pre = tom;        first = jack;        while (true) {            if (first == null) {//true                break;            }            System.out.println(first);            first = first.next; //tom.next = null;        }    }}class Node {    public Object item;    public Node next; //ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹    public Node pre; //å‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹    public Node(Object item) {        this.item = item;    }    public String toString() {        return "Node name = " + item;    }}

package com.zzy.set_;import java.util.HashSet;import java.util.Objects;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class HashSetExercise02 {    public static void main(String[] args) {        HashSet hashSet = new HashSet();        hashSet.add(new Employee_("zzy", 30000,                new Employee_().new MyDate(1998, 11, 24)));        hashSet.add(new Employee_("zzy", 30000,                new Employee_().new MyDate(1998, 11, 24)));        System.out.println(hashSet);    }}class Employee_ {    private String name;    private double salary;    private MyDate birthday;    public Employee_(String name, double salary, MyDate birthday) {        this.name = name;        this.salary = salary;        this.birthday = birthday;    }    public Employee_(){}    class MyDate{        private int year;        private int month;        private int day;        public MyDate(int year, int month, int day) {            this.year = year;            this.month = month;            this.day = day;        }        //é€šè¿‡å†…éƒ¨ç±»çš„hashCodeå’Œ equalsçš„é‡å†™ï¼Œå¥—å¨ƒä½¿å…¶å¾—åˆ°çš„hashCodeä¾æ®birthdayçš„å†…å®¹å†³å®š        //è€Œä¸æ˜¯åœ°å€        @Override        public boolean equals(Object o) {            if (this == o) return true;            if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;            MyDate myDate = (MyDate) o;            return year == myDate.year && month == myDate.month && day == myDate.day;        }        @Override        public int hashCode() {            return Objects.hash(year, month, day);        }    }    @Override    public boolean equals(Object o) {        if (this == o) return true;        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;        Employee_ employee_ = (Employee_) o;        return name.equals(employee_.name) && birthday.equals(employee_.birthday);    }    @Override    public int hashCode() {        //è¿™é‡Œçš„nameæ˜¯åœ¨å¸¸é‡æ± ,ä½†æ˜¯è¦ä¿è¯å†…éƒ¨ç±»çš„æ‰€å½±å“çš„hashCodeä¸€è‡´        return Objects.hash(name, birthday);    }}

package com.zzy.map_;import java.util.*;/** * @autho: å‘¨é’Ÿç‚ * @version: 1.0 */public class Mapfor {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Map map = new HashMap();        map.put("é‚“è¶…", new Book("", 100));        map.put("ç‹å®å¼º", "é©¬è“‰");        map.put("å®‹å–†", "é©¬è“‰");        map.put("é‚“è¶…", "å­™ä¿ª");        map.put(null, "åˆ˜äº¦è²");        Set keyset = map.keySet();        //ç¬¬ä¸€ç»„,é€šè¿‡keyè·å–vales        for (Object o : keyset) {            System.out.println(o + "-" + map.get(o));        }        Iterator it = keyset.iterator();        while (it.hasNext()) {            Object next =  it.next();            System.out.println(next + "-" + map.get(next));        }        //ç¬¬äºŒç»„ï¼Œå–å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„values        Collection values = map.values();        for (Object o : values) {            System.out.println(o);        }        Iterator it2= values.iterator();        while (it2.hasNext()) {            Object next =  it2.next();            System.out.println(next);        }        //é€šè¿‡EntrySet        Set set = map.entrySet();        for (Object o : set) {            //å‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹            Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) o;            System.out.println(entry.getKey() + "-" + entry.getValue());        }        Iterator it3 = set.iterator();        while (it3.hasNext()) {            Object next =  it3.next();            Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) next;            System.out.println(entry.getKey() + "-" +entry.getValue());        }    }}

package com.zzy.abstract_;abstract public class Template {//æŠ½è±¡ç±»-æ¨¡æ¿è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼    public abstract void job();    public void calculateTime() {        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();        job();//åŠ¨æ€ç»‘å®šæœºåˆ¶        long end = System.currentTimeMillis();        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ " + (end - start));    }}

file_io.h

#pragma once#include "image.h"#include <fstream>int readImageInfoFromTxt(const string& path, Image& img, vector<Vector3d>& Pts, vector<Vector2d>& pts) {    ifstream infile(path, ios::in);    if (!infile.is_open()) {        cout << "Lol,failed to open Txt!";        return 0;    }    while (!infile.eof()) {        string str;        infile >> str;        if (str == "ImagePath") {            string img_path;            infile >> img_path;            img.path_ = img_path;        }        else if (str == "width")            infile >> img.width_;        else if (str == "height")            infile >> img.height_;        else if (str == "pixel_size")            infile >> img.pixel_size_;        else if (str == "focal_length")            infile >> img.io_.focal_;        else if (str == "principle_point")            infile >> img.io_.cx_ >> img.io_.cy_;        else if (str == "distortions")            infile >> img.io_.k1_ >> img.io_.k2_ >> img.io_.k3_ >> img.io_.p1_ >> img.io_.p2_;        else if (str == "Points") {            int num;            infile >> num;            Pts.resize(num);            pts.resize(num);            for (int i = 0; i < num; i++)                infile >> Pts[i].x() >> Pts[i].y() >> Pts[i].z() >> pts[i].x() >> pts[i].y();            break;        }    }    infile.close();    return 1;}

#pragma once#include <opencv2/core/core.hpp>#include <opencv2/imgcodecs.hpp>#include <opencv2/highgui.hpp>#include <iostream>#include <string>#include <Eigen/Core>#include <vector>using namespace Eigen;using namespace cv;using namespace std;struct IO {    float focal_; //åƒä¸»è·    float cx_; //åƒä¸»ç‚¹x,å•ä½ä¸ºåƒç´     float cy_; //åƒä¸»ç‚¹yï¼Œå•ä½ä¸ºåƒç´     float k1_;    float k2_;    float k3_;    float p1_;    float p2_;};struct EO {    MatrixXd R_;    MatrixXd T_;};class Image {public:    //æ— å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°    Image() {        width_ = 0;        height_ = 0;        pixel_size_ = 0;        io_.focal_ = 35;        io_.cx_ = 0;        io_.cy_ = 0;        io_.k1_ = io_.k2_ = io_.k3_ = io_.p1_ = io_.p2_ = 0.0;        eo_.R_ = MatrixXd::Ones(3, 3);        eo_.T_ = MatrixXd::Ones(3, 1);    }    //æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°    Image(const int& width, const int& height, const float& pixel_size) {        width_ = width;        height_ = height;        pixel_size_ = pixel_size;        io_.focal_ = 35;        io_.cx_ = (width - 1) / 2;        io_.cy_ = (height - 1) / 2;        io_.k1_ = io_.k2_ = io_.k3_ = io_.p1_ = io_.p2_ = 0.0;        eo_.R_ = MatrixXd::Ones(3, 3);        eo_.T_ = MatrixXd::Ones(3, 1);    }    //å±æ€§å€¼public:    //å½±åƒæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„    string path_ = "";    //å½±åƒåŸºæœ¬å‚æ•°    int width_;    int height_;    float pixel_size_; //å•ä½ä¸ºmm    //å†…å‚    IO io_;    //å¤–å‚    EO eo_;    Mat mat_;public:    void print() {        cout << "width: " << width_ << endl            << "height: " << height_ << endl            << "pixel size: " << pixel_size_ << endl            << "focal length: " << io_.focal_ << endl            << "principle point: " << io_.cx_ << ", " << io_.cy_ << endl            << "distortion params: " << io_.k1_ << " " << io_.k2_ << " " << io_.k3_ << " " << io_.p1_ << " " << io_.p2_ << endl            << "position: " << eo_.T_(0, 0) << " " << eo_.T_(1, 0) << " " << eo_.T_(2, 0) << endl            << "rotation: " << endl            << eo_.R_(0, 0) << " " << eo_.R_(0, 1) << " " << eo_.R_(0, 2) << endl            << eo_.R_(1, 0) << " " << eo_.R_(1, 1) << " " << eo_.R_(1, 2) << endl            << eo_.R_(2, 0) << " " << eo_.R_(2, 1) << " " << eo_.R_(2, 2) << endl;    }    //å°†åƒç‚¹ç”±åƒç´ åæ ‡è½¬æ¢ä¸ºåƒå¹³é¢åæ ‡    void pixelpoints2imagepoints(const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPts, vector<Vector2d>& imgPts);    MatrixXd getRotationfromAngles(const double& phi, const double& omega, const double& kappa);    int readImgData(const string& filepath) {        mat_ = imread(filepath); //è¯»æ–‡ä»¶        if (mat_.data == NULL) {//æµ‹è¯•å½±åƒæ˜¯å¦æ‰“å¼€            cout << "Failed to read the image file.
";            return 0;        }        path_ = filepath;        width_ = mat_.cols;        height_ = mat_.rows;    }    void showImg() {        if (mat_.data == NULL) {            cout << "No image data.
";            return;        }        Mat img_show;        mat_.copyTo(img_show);        namedWindow(path_, CV_WINDOW_NORMAL);        resizeWindow(path_, 960, int(height_ * 960.0 / width_));        moveWindow(path_, 100, 100);        imshow(path_, img_show);    }};int save_structure(    const string& savepath,    const std::vector<Mat>& Rs,    const std::vector<Mat>& Ts,    const std::vector<Point3d>& points,    const Mat& mask);

#include "image.h"#include <vector>void Image::pixelpoints2imagepoints(const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPts, vector<Vector2d>& imgPts) {    double pix_size = pixel_size_ / 1000.0;    imgPts.resize(pixelPts.size());    for (int i = 0; i < pixelPts.size(); i++) {        double u = pixelPts[i].x();        double v = pixelPts[i].y();        double x = (u - io_.cx_) * pix_size;        double y = -(v - io_.cy_) * pix_size;        double r2 = x * x + y * y;        double r4 = r2 * r2;        double r6 = r2 * r4;        imgPts[i].x() = x + x * (io_.k1_ * r2 + io_.k2_ * r4 + io_.k3_ * r6) + io_.p1_ * (r2 + 2 * x * x) + 2 * io_.p2_ * x * y;        imgPts[i].y() = y + y * (io_.k1_ * r2 + io_.k2_ * r4 + io_.k3_ * r6) + io_.p1_ * (r2 + 2 * y * y) + 2 * io_.p2_ * x * y;    }}MatrixXd Image::getRotationfromAngles(const double& phi, const double& omega, const double& kappa) {    eo_.R_(0, 0) = cos(phi) * cos(kappa) - sin(phi) * sin(omega) * sin(kappa);    eo_.R_(0, 1) = -cos(phi) * sin(kappa) - sin(phi) * sin(omega) * cos(kappa);    eo_.R_(0, 2) = -sin(phi) * cos(omega);    eo_.R_(1, 0) = cos(omega) * sin(kappa);    eo_.R_(1, 1) = cos(omega) * cos(kappa);    eo_.R_(1, 2) = -sin(omega);    eo_.R_(2, 0) = sin(phi) * cos(kappa) + cos(phi) * sin(omega) * sin(kappa);    eo_.R_(2, 1) = -sin(phi) * sin(kappa) + cos(phi) * sin(omega) * cos(kappa);    eo_.R_(2, 2) = cos(phi) * cos(omega);    return eo_.R_;}int save_structure(    const string& savepath,    const std::vector<Mat>& Rs,    const std::vector<Mat>& Ts,    const std::vector<Point3d>& points,    const Mat& mask) {    int n = (int)Rs.size();    FileStorage fs(savepath, FileStorage::WRITE);    if (!fs.isOpened())        return 0;    fs << "Camera Count" << n;    fs << "Point Count" << (int)points.size();    fs << "Rotations" << "[";    for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {        if (Rs[i].empty())            fs << cv::Mat::zeros(3, 3, CV_64FC1);        else            //fs << Rs[i].inv();            fs << Rs[i];    }    fs << "]";    fs << "Motions" << "[";    for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)    {        if (Ts[i].empty() || Rs[i].empty())            fs << cv::Mat::zeros(3, 1, CV_64FC1);        else            //fs << -Rs[i].inv() * Ts[i];            fs << Ts[i];    }    fs << "]";    fs << "Points" << "[";    for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i)    {        fs << points[i];    }    fs << "]";    fs << "Colors" << "[";    for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i)    {        if (mask.at<uchar>(i) > 0)            fs << Vec3b(255, 255, 0);        else            fs << Vec3b(0, 0, 255);    }    fs << "]";    fs.release();    return 1;}

#pragma once#include "image.h"class SpaceResection {public:    int EulerAngleMethod(Image img, const vector<Vector3d>& Pts, const vector<Vector2d>& pts);    int useCeres(Image& img, const vector<Vector3d>& Pts, const vector<Vector2d>& pts);};

#include "space_Resection.h"#include<cmath>#include<Eigen/LU>#include <ceres/ceres.h>#include <glog/logging.h>#ifdef max#undef max#endif //max#ifdef min#undef min#endif //minconstexpr auto G_ERROR = 1e-3;        //å¹³ç§»åæ ‡æ”¹æ­£å€¼é˜ˆå€¼constexpr auto A_ERROR = 1e-7;        //æ—‹è½¬è§’æ”¹æ­£å€¼é˜ˆå€¼static double f_ = 50;struct EulerAngleBackCrossResidual{    /*    X,Y,Z,x,yåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºè§‚æµ‹å€¼    */    EulerAngleBackCrossResidual(double X, double Y, double Z, double x, double y)        : X_(X), Y_(Y), Z_(Z), x_(x), y_(y) {};    template <class T>    bool operator()(const T* const pBackCrossParameters, T* residual) const {        T dXs = pBackCrossParameters[0];        T dYs = pBackCrossParameters[1];        T dZs = pBackCrossParameters[2];        T dPhi = pBackCrossParameters[3];        T dOmega = pBackCrossParameters[4];        T dKappa = pBackCrossParameters[5];        T a1 = ceres::cos(dPhi) * ceres::cos(dKappa) - ceres::sin(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dOmega) * ceres::sin(dKappa);        T a2 = -ceres::cos(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dKappa) - ceres::sin(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dOmega) * ceres::cos(dKappa);        T a3 = -ceres::sin(dPhi) * ceres::cos(dOmega);        T b1 = ceres::cos(dOmega) * ceres::sin(dKappa);        T b2 = ceres::cos(dOmega) * ceres::cos(dKappa);        T b3 = -ceres::sin(dOmega);        T c1 = ceres::sin(dPhi) * ceres::cos(dKappa) + ceres::cos(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dOmega) * ceres::sin(dKappa);        T c2 = -ceres::sin(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dKappa) + ceres::cos(dPhi) * ceres::sin(dOmega) * ceres::cos(dKappa);        T c3 = ceres::cos(dPhi) * ceres::cos(dOmega);        T XX = a1 * (X_ - dXs) + b1 * (Y_ - dYs) + c1 * (Z_ - dZs);        T YY = a2 * (X_ - dXs) + b2 * (Y_ - dYs) + c2 * (Z_ - dZs);        T ZZ = a3 * (X_ - dXs) + b3 * (Y_ - dYs) + c3 * (Z_ - dZs);        //æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ®‹å·®        residual[0] = T(x_) + T(f_) * XX / ZZ;        residual[1] = T(y_) + T(f_) * YY / ZZ;        return true;    }private:    const double X_;    const double Y_;    const double Z_;    const double x_;    const double y_;};int SpaceResection::EulerAngleMethod(Image img, const vector<Vector3d>& Pts, const vector<Vector2d>& pts) {    //è®¡ç®—å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´ åˆå§‹å€¼    int Num = max(3.0, pts.size() / 2.0);//ç”¨ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç©ºé—´åæ–¹äº¤ä¼šè®¡ç®—ï¼Œå¦ä¸€åŠè¿›è¡Œç²¾åº¦éªŒè¯    vector<Vector2d> imgPts;    img.pixelpoints2imagepoints(pts, imgPts);    double f = img.io_.focal_ / 1000.0;    //ä¼°ç®—æ‘„å½±æ¯”ä¾‹å°º    double GS = 0, SS = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < Num - 1; i++) {        GS += (Pts[i] - Pts[i + 1]).norm();        SS += (imgPts[i] - imgPts[i + 1]).norm();    }    double lfScale = GS / SS;    //ä¼°ç®—å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´ åˆå§‹å€¼    double Xs = 0, Ys = 0, Zs = 0, phi = 0, omega = 0, kappa = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < Num; i++) {        Xs += Pts[i].x();        Ys += Pts[i].y();        Zs += Pts[i].z();    }    Xs /= Num;    Ys /= Num;    Zs /= Num;    Zs += f * lfScale;    double fSANGLE = atan2((imgPts[1] - imgPts[0]).y(), (imgPts[1] - imgPts[0]).x());    double fGANGLE = atan2((Pts[1] - Pts[0]).y(), (Pts[1] - Pts[0]).x());    kappa = fSANGLE - fGANGLE;    MatrixXd B = MatrixXd(2 * Num, 6);    MatrixXd L = MatrixXd(2 * Num, 1);    MatrixXd Delta = MatrixXd::Ones(6, 1);    int iterationNum = 0;    do {        //è¯¯å·®æ–¹ç¨‹        MatrixXd R = img.getRotationfromAngles(phi, omega, kappa);        for (int i = 0; i < Num; i++) {            MatrixXd P = MatrixXd(3, 1);            P(0, 0) = Pts[i].x() - Xs;            P(1, 0) = Pts[i].y() - Ys;            P(2, 0) = Pts[i].z() - Zs;            MatrixXd PP = R.transpose() * P;            double x = imgPts[i].x();            double y = imgPts[i].y();            //double x = -f * PP(0,0) / PP(2, 0)            //double y = -f * PP(1, 0) / PP(2,0)            double b11 = (R(0, 0) * f + R(0, 2) * x) / PP(2, 0);            double b12 = (R(1, 0) * f + R(1, 2) * x) / PP(2, 0);            double b13 = (R(2, 0) * f + R(2, 2) * x) / PP(2, 0);            double b14 = y * sin(omega) - (x / f * (x * cos(kappa) - y * sin(kappa)) + f * cos(kappa)) * cos(omega);            double b15 = -f * sin(kappa) - x / f * (x * sin(kappa) + y * cos(kappa));            double b16 = y;            double b21 = (R(0, 1) * f + R(0, 2) * y) / PP(2, 0);            double b22 = (R(1, 1) * f + R(1, 2) * y) / PP(2, 0);            double b23 = (R(2, 1) * f + R(2, 2) * y) / PP(2, 0);            double b24 = -x * sin(omega) - (y / f * (x * cos(kappa) - y * sin(kappa)) - f * sin(kappa)) * cos(omega);            double b25 = -f * cos(kappa) - y / f * (x * sin(kappa) + y * cos(kappa));            double b26 = -x;            double xx = -f * PP(0, 0) / PP(2, 0);            double yy = -f * PP(1, 0) / PP(2, 0);            B(i * 2 + 0, 0) = b11; B(i * 2 + 0, 1) = b12; B(i * 2 + 0, 2) = b13;            B(i * 2 + 0, 3) = b14; B(i * 2 + 0, 4) = b15; B(i * 2 + 0, 5) = b16;            B(i * 2 + 1, 0) = b21; B(i * 2 + 1, 1) = b22; B(i * 2 + 1, 2) = b23;            B(i * 2 + 1, 3) = b24; B(i * 2 + 1, 4) = b25; B(i * 2 + 1, 5) = b26;            L(i * 2 + 0, 0) = imgPts[i].x() - xx;            L(i * 2 + 1, 0) = imgPts[i].y() - yy;        }        cout << "********** iteration num:" << iterationNum << "*****************" << endl;        cout << "B: " << endl << B << endl << "-----------------" << endl;        cout << "L: " << endl << L << endl << "-----------------" << endl;        MatrixXd BT = B.transpose();        MatrixXd BTB = BT * B;        MatrixXd BTBinv = BTB.inverse();        Delta = BTBinv * (BT * L);        cout << "Delta: " << endl << Delta << endl << endl;        //ä¿®æ­£å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´         Xs += Delta(0, 0);        Ys += Delta(1, 0);        Zs += Delta(2, 0);        phi += Delta(3, 0);        omega += Delta(4, 0);        kappa += Delta(5, 0);        iterationNum++;    } while ((fabs(Delta(0, 0)) > G_ERROR || fabs(Delta(1, 0)) > G_ERROR || fabs(Delta(2, 0)) > G_ERROR ||        fabs(Delta(3, 0)) > A_ERROR || fabs(Delta(4, 0)) > A_ERROR || fabs(Delta(5, 0)) > A_ERROR)        && iterationNum < 1000);    //è®¡ç®—å•ä½æƒä¸­è¯¯å·®    MatrixXd v = B * Delta - L;    cout << "v: " << endl << v << endl << "--------------" << endl;    MatrixXd s = v.transpose() * v;    double m0 = sqrtf(s(0, 0) / (2 * Num - 6));    cout << "--------------å•ä½æƒä¸­è¯¯å·® m0= " << m0 << "--------------------" << endl;    img.eo_.T_(0, 0) = Xs;    img.eo_.T_(1, 0) = Ys;    img.eo_.T_(2, 0) = Zs;    //éªŒè¯    MatrixXd R = img.getRotationfromAngles(phi, omega, kappa);    for (int i = 0; i < Pts.size(); i++) {        double x = imgPts[i].x();        double y = imgPts[i].y();        MatrixXd P = MatrixXd(3, 1);        P(0, 0) = Pts[i].x() - Xs;        P(1, 0) = Pts[i].y() - Ys;        P(2, 0) = Pts[i].z() - Zs;        MatrixXd PP = R.transpose() * P;        double xx = -f * PP(0, 0) / PP(2, 0);        double yy = -f * PP(1, 0) / PP(2, 0);        double du = (x - xx) / img.pixel_size_;        double dv = (y - yy) / img.pixel_size_;        if (i >= Num)            cout << "check points: --------------" << endl;        cout << "point " << i << ": dx=" << du << ",  dy=" << dv << " error = " << sqrtf(du * du + dv * dv) << " pixels "            << endl << "----------------" << endl;    }    cout << "Position: ";    cout << img.eo_.T_(0, 0) << ", " << img.eo_.T_(1, 0) << ", " << img.eo_.T_(2, 0) << endl;    cout << "Rotation: " << endl << img.eo_.R_;    return 1;}int SpaceResection::useCeres(Image& img, const vector<Vector3d>& Pts, const vector<Vector2d>& pts) {    //è®¡ç®—å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´ åˆå§‹å€¼    int Num = max(3.0, pts.size() / 2.0);//ç”¨ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç©ºé—´åæ–¹äº¤ä¼šè®¡ç®—ï¼Œå¦ä¸€åŠè¿›è¡Œç²¾åº¦éªŒè¯    vector<Vector2d> imgPts;    img.pixelpoints2imagepoints(pts, imgPts);    double f = img.io_.focal_ / 1000.0;    //ä¼°ç®—æ‘„å½±æ¯”ä¾‹å°º     double GS = 0, SS = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < Num - 1; i++) {        GS += (Pts[i] - Pts[i + 1]).norm();        SS += (imgPts[i] - imgPts[i + 1]).norm();    }    double lfScale = GS / SS;    //ä¼°ç®—å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´ åˆå§‹å€¼    double Xs = 0, Ys = 0, Zs = 0, phi = 0, omega = 0, kappa = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < Num; i++) {        Xs += Pts[i].x();        Ys += Pts[i].y();        Zs += Pts[i].z();    }    Xs /= Num;    Ys /= Num;    Zs /= Num;    Zs += f * lfScale;    double fSANGLE = atan2((imgPts[1] - imgPts[0]).y(), (imgPts[1] - imgPts[0]).x());    double fGANGLE = atan2((Pts[1] - Pts[0]).y(), (Pts[1] - Pts[0]).x());    kappa = fSANGLE - fGANGLE;    MatrixXd B = MatrixXd(2 * Num, 6);    MatrixXd L = MatrixXd(2 * Num, 1);    MatrixXd Delta = MatrixXd::Ones(6, 1);    //åˆ©ç”¨Ceres Solverè®¡ç®—å¤–æ–¹ä½å…ƒç´     f_ = f;    double dBackCrossParameters[6] = { Xs, Ys, Zs, phi, omega, kappa };    ceres::Problem problem;    for (int i = 0; i < Num; i++) {        EulerAngleBackCrossResidual* pResidual =            new EulerAngleBackCrossResidual(Pts[i].x(), Pts[i].y(), Pts[i].z(), imgPts[i].x(), imgPts[i].y());        problem.AddResidualBlock(            new ceres::AutoDiffCostFunction<EulerAngleBackCrossResidual, 2, 6>(pResidual),            NULL, dBackCrossParameters);    }    ceres::Solver::Options m_options;    ceres::Solver::Summary m_summary;    m_options.max_num_iterations = 1000;    m_options.linear_solver_type = ceres::DENSE_QR;    m_options.minimizer_progress_to_stdout = true;    ceres::Solve(m_options, &problem, &m_summary);    cout << "-------------------------------" << endl;    cout.precision(10);    cout << m_summary.BriefReport() << "
";    img.eo_.T_(0, 0) = dBackCrossParameters[0];    img.eo_.T_(1, 0) = dBackCrossParameters[1];    img.eo_.T_(2, 0) = dBackCrossParameters[2];    //éªŒè¯    MatrixXd R = img.getRotationfromAngles(dBackCrossParameters[3], dBackCrossParameters[4], dBackCrossParameters[5]);    for (int i = Num; i < Pts.size(); i++) {        double x = imgPts[i].x();        double y = imgPts[i].y();        MatrixXd P = MatrixXd(3, 1);        P(0, 0) = Pts[i].x() - Xs;        P(1, 0) = Pts[i].y() - Ys;        P(2, 0) = Pts[i].z() - Zs;        MatrixXd PP = R.transpose() * P;        double xx = -f * PP(0, 0) / PP(2, 0);        double yy = -f * PP(1, 0) / PP(2, 0);        double du = (x - xx) / img.pixel_size_;        double dv = (y - yy) / img.pixel_size_;        cout << "point " << i << ": dx=" << du << ",  dy=" << dv << " error = " << sqrtf(du * du + dv * dv) << " pixels "            << endl << "----------------" << endl;    }    cout << "Position: ";    cout << img.eo_.T_(0, 0) << ", " << img.eo_.T_(1, 0) << ", " << img.eo_.T_(2, 0) << endl;    cout << "Rotation: " << endl << img.eo_.R_;    return 1;}

#pragma once#include <opencv2/core.hpp>using namespace std;using namespace cv;class FeatureDetection {public:    int Harris(        const Mat& img,                    //å½±åƒ        vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    //å½±åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        Mat& description,                //ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹æè¿°        int blockSize = 2,                //Neighborhood size        int apertureSize = 3,            //Aperture parameter for the Sobel operator        double k = 0.04,                //Harris detector free parameter        float thresh = 0.75                //threshold(0 ~ 1.0)    );    void showFeature(const Mat& img, const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints);    int Sift(        const Mat& img,                    //å½±åƒ        vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    //å½±åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        Mat& description,                //ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹æè¿°        const int& nfeatrues = 0,        //The number of best features to ratain        const int& nOctaveLayers = 3,    //The number of layers in each octave        const double& contrastThreshold = 0.04,    //The contrast threshold will be divided by        const double& edgeThreshold = 20,        //The threshold used to filter out edge-like features.        const double& sigma = 1.6                //The sigma if the Gaussian applied to the input image at the octave.    );    int Surf(        const Mat& img,                    //å½±åƒ        vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    //å½±åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        Mat& description,                //ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹æè¿°        const double& hessianThreshold = 100,    //Threshold for hessian keypoint detector used in Surf.        const int& nOctaves = 4,                //Number of pyramid octaves the keypoint detector will use.            const int& nOctaveLayers = 3            //Number of octave layers within each octave.    );};class FeatureMatching {public:    int Brute_force(        const Mat& description1,        //ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹æè¿°        const Mat& description2,        //ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹æè¿°        vector<DMatch>& matched,        //åŒ¹é…ç»“æœ        const float& ratio_thresh = 0.7    );    void showMatches(        const Mat& img1,        const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints1,        const Mat& img2,        const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints2,        const vector<DMatch>& matches    );    int FLANN_based(        const Mat& description1,        const Mat& description2,        vector<DMatch>& matches,        const float& ratio_thresh = 0.7    );};

feature_matching.cpp

#include "feature_matching.h"#include <opencv2/highgui.hpp>#include <opencv2/imgproc.hpp>#include <opencv2/features2d.hpp>#include <opencv2/xfeatures2d.hpp>using namespace cv::xfeatures2d;int FeatureDetection::Harris(    const Mat& img,    vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    Mat& description,    int blockSize,    int apertureSize,    double k,    float thresh) {    Mat img_gray;    cvtColor(img, img_gray, COLOR_RGB2GRAY);    //Corners è§’ç‚¹ç‰¹å¾æå–    Mat dst, dst_norm;    dst = Mat::zeros(img_gray.size(), CV_32FC1);    cornerHarris(img_gray, dst, blockSize, apertureSize, k, BORDER_DEFAULT);    //ç‰¹å¾å½±åƒå½’ä¸€åŒ–å¤„ç†    normalize(dst, dst_norm, 0, 1.0, NORM_MINMAX, CV_32FC1, Mat());    //æå–ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹    keypoints.resize(0);    for (int j = 1; j < dst_norm.rows - 1; j++) {        for (int i = 1; i < dst_norm.cols - 1; i++) {            if (dst_norm.at<float>(j, i) > thresh)                keypoints.push_back(KeyPoint(i, j, 20.0));        }    }    //å°†è§’ç‚¹è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç‰¹å¾æè¿°    //ç‰¹å¾æè¿°descriptionä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µï¼Œå…¶ä¸­çŸ©é˜µçš„æ¯ä¸€è¡Œå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªKeypoints    //æ¯ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ª9ç»´çš„å‘é‡ï¼Œå‘é‡1ä¸ªå€¼ä¸ºå½“å‰ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹çš„ç°åº¦å€¼ï¼Œå‰©ä½™8ä¸ªå€¼åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå‘é‡åƒç´ ç‚¹ä¸å½“å‰ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹çš„ç°åº¦å·®    description = Mat::zeros(keypoints.size(), 9, CV_32F);    for (int i = 0; i < keypoints.size(); i++) {        float v = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt);        description.at<float>(i, 0) = v;        description.at<float>(i, 1) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(-1, -1)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 2) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(-1, 0)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 3) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(-1, 1)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 4) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(0, -1)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 5) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(0, 1)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 6) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(0, -1)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 7) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(0, 0)) - v;        description.at<float>(i, 8) = img_gray.at<uchar>(keypoints[i].pt - Point2f(0, 1)) - v;    }    return 1;}void FeatureDetection::showFeature(const Mat& img, const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints) {    Mat img_show;    img.copyTo(img_show);    if (img_show.channels() == 1) {        cvtColor(img_show, img_show, COLOR_GRAY2BGR);    }    for (int i = 0; i < keypoints.size(); i++) {        Point p = keypoints[i].pt;        circle(img_show, p, keypoints[i].size, Scalar(0, 255, 0), 10, 8, 0);    }    string win_str = "Featured image";    namedWindow(win_str, WINDOW_NORMAL);    resizeWindow(win_str, 960, int(img_show.rows * 960.0 / img_show.cols));    moveWindow(win_str, 100, 100);    imshow(win_str, img_show);}int FeatureDetection::Sift(    const Mat& img,    vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    Mat& description,    const int& nfeatrues, /* = 0, ä¿ç•™çš„æœ€ä½³ç‰¹æ€§çš„æ•°é‡*/    const int& nOctaveLayers, /* = 3ï¼Œé«˜æ–¯é‡‘å­—å¡”æœ€å°å±‚çº§æ•°ï¼Œç”±å›¾åƒè‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—å‡º */    const double& contrastThreshold, /* = 0.04ï¼Œ å¯¹æ¯”é˜ˆå€¼ç”¨äºè¿‡æ»¤åŒºåŸŸä¸­çš„å¼±ç‰¹å¾ã€‚é˜ˆå€¼è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œæ£€æµ‹å™¨äº§ç”Ÿçš„ç‰¹å¾è¶Šå°‘*/    const double& edgeThreshold, /* = 10, ç”¨äºè¿‡æ»¤æ‰ç±»ä¼¼è¾¹ç¼˜ç‰¹å¾çš„é˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œä¸å¯¹æ¯”é˜ˆå€¼ä¸åŒï¼Œå³è¾¹ç¼˜é˜ˆå€¼è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œæ»¤å‡ºçš„ç‰¹å¾è¶Šå°‘*/    const double& sigma /* = 1.6ï¼Œ é«˜æ–¯è¾“å…¥å±‚çº§ï¼Œ å¦‚æœå›¾åƒåˆ†è¾¨ç‡è¾ƒä½ï¼Œåˆ™å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦å‡å°‘æ•°å€¼*/) {    Mat img_gray;    cvtColor(img, img_gray, COLOR_RGB2GRAY);    Ptr<SIFT> detector = SIFT::create(nfeatrues, nOctaveLayers, contrastThreshold, edgeThreshold, sigma, CV_32F);    detector->detectAndCompute(img_gray, Mat(), keypoints, description, false);    return 1;}int FeatureDetection::Surf(    const Mat& img,    vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints,    Mat& description,    const double& hessianThreshold,    const int& nOctaves,    const int& nOctaveLayers) {    Mat img_gray;    cvtColor(img, img_gray, COLOR_RGB2GRAY);    Ptr<SURF> detector = SURF::create(hessianThreshold, nOctaves, nOctaveLayers);    detector->detectAndCompute(img_gray, noArray(), keypoints, description);    return 1;}int FeatureMatching::Brute_force(    const Mat& description1,    const Mat& description2,    vector<DMatch>& matches,    const float& ratio_thresh) {    vector<vector<DMatch>> all_matches;    BFMatcher BF_matcher(NORM_L2);    BF_matcher.knnMatch(description1, description2, all_matches, 2);    float mindistance = FLT_MAX;    for (int i = 0; i < all_matches.size(); i++) {        if (all_matches[i][0].distance > ratio_thresh * all_matches[i][1].distance) {            continue;        }        float distance = all_matches[i][0].distance;        if (distance < mindistance) {            mindistance = distance;        }    }    vector<DMatch> good_matches;    for (int j = 0; j < all_matches.size(); j++) {        if (all_matches[j][0].distance > ratio_thresh * all_matches[j][1].distance ||            all_matches[j][0].distance > 5 * mindistance) {            continue;        }        good_matches.push_back(all_matches[j][0]);    }    matches = good_matches;    return 1;}void FeatureMatching::showMatches(    const Mat& img1,    const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints1,    const Mat& img2,    const vector<KeyPoint>& keypoints2,    const vector<DMatch>& matches) {    // Draw matches    Mat img_matches;    //åŸå§‹å›¾åƒå°ºå¯¸å¤ªå¤§ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€‚å½“ç¼©æ”¾    Mat mat1, mat2;    resize(img1, mat1, Size(), 0.15, 0.15);    resize(img2, mat2, Size(), 0.15, 0.15);    vector<KeyPoint> kpts1 = keypoints1;    vector<KeyPoint> kpts2 = keypoints2;    for (int i = 0; i < kpts1.size(); i++) {        kpts1[i].pt *= 0.15;    }    for (int i = 0; i < kpts2.size(); i++) {        kpts2[i].pt *= 0.15;    }    //ç”Ÿæˆç»˜åˆ¶åŒ¹é…ç»“æœçš„å›¾åƒ    drawMatches(mat1, kpts1, mat2, kpts2, matches, img_matches, Scalar::all(-1),        Scalar::all(-1), vector<char>(), DrawMatchesFlags::NOT_DRAW_SINGLE_POINTS);    //Show detected matches    string win_str = "Matches";    namedWindow(win_str, WINDOW_NORMAL);    resizeWindow(win_str, img_matches.cols, img_matches.rows);    imshow("Matches", img_matches);}int FeatureMatching::FLANN_based(    const Mat& description1,    const Mat& description2,    vector<DMatch>& matches,    const float& ratio_thresh) {    vector <vector<DMatch>> all_matches;    Ptr<DescriptorMatcher> FB_matcher = DescriptorMatcher::create(DescriptorMatcher::FLANNBASED);    FB_matcher->knnMatch(description1, description2, all_matches, 2);    float mindistance = FLT_MAX;    for (int i = 0; i < all_matches.size(); i++) {        if (all_matches[i][0].distance > ratio_thresh * all_matches[i][1].distance) {            continue;        }        float distance = all_matches[i][0].distance;        if (distance < mindistance) {            mindistance = distance;        }    }    vector<DMatch> good_matches;    for (int j = 0; j < all_matches.size(); j++) {        if (all_matches[j][0].distance > ratio_thresh * all_matches[j][1].distance ||            all_matches[j][0].distance > 5 * mindistance) {            continue;        }        good_matches.push_back(all_matches[j][0]);    }    matches = good_matches;    return 1;}

image_orientation.h

#pragma once#include "image.h"class RelativeOrientation {public:    int ContinuousMethod(        const Image& imgL,                    //å·¦åƒ        const Image& imgR,                    //å³åƒ        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsL,    //å·¦åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsR,    //å³åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        Mat& rR,                            //å³åƒç›¸å¯¹äºå·¦åƒçš„æ—‹è½¬çŸ©é˜µ        Vector3d& rT                        //å³åƒç›¸å¯¹äºå·¦åƒçš„å¹³ç§»å‚æ•°    );    int IndependentMethod(        const Image& imgL,                    //å·¦åƒ        const Image& imgR,                    //å³åƒ        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsL,    //å·¦åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsR,    //å³åƒä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾ç‚¹        Mat& rR,                            //å³åƒç›¸å¯¹äºå·¦åƒçš„æ—‹è½¬çŸ©é˜µ        Vector3d& rT                        //å³åƒç›¸å¯¹äºå·¦åƒçš„å¹³ç§»å‚æ•°    );    int cv(        const Image& imgL,        const Image& imgR,        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsL,        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsR,        Mat& rR,        Vector3d& rT    );};

image_orientation.cpp

#include "image_orientation.h"#include <opencv2/calib3d.hpp>int RelativeOrientation::cv(    const Image& imgL,    const Image& imgR,    const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsL,    const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsR,    Mat& rR,    Vector3d& rT) {    if (pixelPtsL.size() != pixelPtsR.size()) {        return 0;    }    //å‡è®¾å·¦å³å½±åƒä¸ºåŒä¸€ä¼ æ„Ÿå™¨æ‹æ‘„çš„å½±åƒï¼Œå³å…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„å†…å‚    double focal_length = imgL.io_.focal_ / imgL.pixel_size_;    Point2d principle_point = Point2d(imgL.io_.cx_, imgL.io_.cy_);    vector<Point2d> pts1(pixelPtsL.size()), pts2(pixelPtsR.size());    for (int i = 0; i < pixelPtsL.size(); i++) {        pts1[i] = Point2d(pixelPtsL[i].x(), pixelPtsL[i].y());        pts2[i] = Point2d(pixelPtsR[i].x(), pixelPtsR[i].y());    }    //è®¡ç®—æœ¬å¾çŸ©é˜µ    Mat mask;    Mat E = cv::findEssentialMat(pts1, pts2, focal_length, principle_point,        RANSAC, 0.9999, 1.0, mask);    if (E.empty()) {        return 0;    }    double feasible_count = cv::countNonZero(mask);    //å¯¹äºRANSACæ¥è¯´ï¼Œoutlierçš„æ•°é‡å¤§äº50%æ—¶ï¼Œç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸å¯é çš„    if (feasible_count / pixelPtsL.size() < 0.5) {        return 0;    }    //åˆ†è§£æœ¬å¾çŸ©é˜µï¼Œè·å–ç›¸å¯¹å˜æ¢    Mat R, t;    int pass_count = cv::recoverPose(E, pts1, pts2, R, t, focal_length, principle_point, mask);    //åŒæ—¶ï¼Œä½äºä¸¤ä¸ªç›¸æœºå‰æ–¹çš„ç‚¹æ•°é‡è¦è¶³å¤Ÿå¤§    if (((double)pass_count) / feasible_count < 0.7) {        return 0;    }    R.copyTo(rR);    rT = Vector3d(t.at<double>(0, 0), t.at<double>(1, 0), t.at<double>(2, 0));    //è¿™é‡Œçš„rRå’ŒrTæ»¡è¶³CVé‡Œçš„åæ ‡è½¬æ¢å…³ç³»ï¼Œå³    //            | x2 |            | x1 |    //            | y2 |    = R *    | y1 | + t    //            | z2 |            | z1 |         return 1;}

forword_intersection.h

#pragma once#include "image.h"class ForwardIntersection{public:    ForwardIntersection() {};    ~ForwardIntersection() {};private:    Mat_<double> LinearLSTriangulation(        Point3d u,        Matx34d P,        Point3d u1,        Matx34d P1)    {        //build matrix A for homogenous equation system Ax = 0        //assume X = (x,y,z,1), for Linear-LS method        //which turns it into a AX = B system, where A is 4x3, X is 3x1 and B is 4x1        Matx43d A(u.x * P(2, 0) - P(0, 0), u.x * P(2, 1) - P(0, 1), u.x * P(2, 2) - P(0, 2),            u.y * P(2, 0) - P(1, 0), u.y * P(2, 1) - P(1, 1), u.y * P(2, 2) - P(1, 2),            u1.x * P1(2, 0) - P1(0, 0), u1.x * P1(2, 1) - P1(0, 1), u1.x * P1(2, 2) - P1(0, 2),            u1.y * P1(2, 0) - P1(1, 0), u1.y * P1(2, 1) - P1(1, 1), u1.y * P1(2, 2) - P1(1, 2)        );        Mat_<double> B = (Mat_<double>(4, 1) << -(u.x * P(2, 3) - P(0, 3)),            -(u.y * P(2, 3) - P(1, 3)),            -(u1.x * P1(2, 3) - P1(0, 3)),            -(u1.y * P1(2, 3) - P1(1, 3)));        Mat_<double> X;        solve(A, B, X, DECOMP_SVD);        return X;    }    Mat_<double> IterativeLinearLSTriangulation(        Point3d u,        Matx34d P,        Point3d u1,        Matx34d P1)    {        double wi = 1, wi1 = 1;        Mat_<double> X(4, 1);        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)        {            //Hartley suggests 10 iterations at most            Mat_<double> X_ = LinearLSTriangulation(u, P, u1, P1);            X(0) = X_(0); X(1) = X_(1); X(2) = X_(2); X(3) = 1.0;            //recalculate weights            double p2x = Mat_<double>(Mat_<double>(P).row(2) * X)(0);            double p2x1 = Mat_<double>(Mat_<double>(P1).row(2) * X)(0);            //breaking point            if (fabsf(wi - p2x) <= 0.000001 && fabsf(wi1 - p2x1) <= 0.000001) break;            wi = p2x;            wi1 = p2x1;            //reweight equations and solve            Matx43d A((u.x * P(2, 0) - P(0, 0)) / wi, (u.x * P(2, 1) - P(0, 1)) / wi, (u.x * P(2, 2) - P(0, 2)) / wi,                (u.y * P(2, 0) - P(1, 0)) / wi, (u.y * P(2, 1) - P(1, 1)) / wi, (u.y * P(2, 2) - P(1, 2)) / wi,                (u1.x * P1(2, 0) - P1(0, 0)) / wi1, (u1.x * P1(2, 1) - P1(0, 1)) / wi1, (u1.x * P1(2, 2) - P1(0, 2)) / wi1,                (u1.y * P1(2, 0) - P1(1, 0)) / wi1, (u1.y * P1(2, 1) - P1(1, 1)) / wi1, (u1.y * P1(2, 2) - P1(1, 2)) / wi1            );            Mat_<double> B = (Mat_<double>(4, 1) << -(u.x * P(2, 3) - P(0, 3)) / wi,                -(u.y * P(2, 3) - P(1, 3)) / wi,                -(u1.x * P1(2, 3) - P1(0, 3)) / wi1,                -(u1.y * P1(2, 3) - P1(1, 3)) / wi1                );            solve(A, B, X_, DECOMP_SVD);            X(0) = X_(0); X(1) = X_(1); X(2) = X_(2); X(3) = 1.0;        }        return X;    }public:    int cv(        const Image& imgL,        const Image& imgR,        const Mat& RcvL,        const Mat& RcvR,        const Mat& TcvL,        const Mat& TcvR,        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsL,        const vector<Vector2d>& pixelPtsR,        vector<Point3d>& space_pts,        Mat& mask    )    {        Mat proj1(3, 4, CV_64FC1);        Mat proj2(3, 4, CV_64FC1);        double fx = imgL.io_.focal_ / imgL.pixel_size_;        double fy = fx;        double cx = imgL.io_.cx_;        double cy = imgL.io_.cy_;        Mat K = (cv::Mat_<double>(3, 3) << fx, 0, cx, 0, fy, cy, 0, 0, 1);        RcvL.convertTo(proj1(Range(0, 3), Range(0, 3)), CV_64FC1);        proj1.at<double>(0, 3) = TcvL.at<double>(0);        proj1.at<double>(1, 3) = TcvL.at<double>(1);        proj1.at<double>(2, 3) = TcvL.at<double>(2);        RcvR.convertTo(proj2(Range(0, 3), Range(0, 3)), CV_64FC1);        proj2.at<double>(0, 3) = TcvR.at<double>(0);        proj2.at<double>(1, 3) = TcvR.at<double>(1);        proj2.at<double>(2, 3) = TcvR.at<double>(2);        // triangulate points        int pts_size = pixelPtsL.size();        space_pts.resize(pixelPtsL.size());        for (int i = 0; i < pts_size; i++)        {            Point2f kp = Point2f(pixelPtsL[i].x(), pixelPtsL[i].y());            Point3d u1(kp.x, kp.y, 1.0);            Mat_<double> um1 = K.inv() * Mat_<double>(u1);            u1 = Point3d(um1.at<double>(0), um1.at<double>(1), um1.at<double>(2));            Point2f kp1 = Point2f(pixelPtsR[i].x(), pixelPtsR[i].y());            Point3d u2(kp1.x, kp1.y, 1.0);            Mat_<double> um2 = K.inv() * Mat_<double>(u2);            u2 = Point3d(um2.at<double>(0), um2.at<double>(1), um2.at<double>(2));            Mat_<double> X = IterativeLinearLSTriangulation(u1, proj1, u2, proj2);            space_pts[i] = Point3d(X(0), X(1), X(2));        }        int fail_count = 0;        mask = cv::Mat::ones(1, space_pts.size(), CV_8UC1);        for (int i = 0; i < space_pts.size(); i++)        {            Mat P = (Mat_<double>(4, 1) << space_pts[i].x, space_pts[i].y, space_pts[i].z, 1);            Mat pix1 = K * proj1 * P;            pix1 /= pix1.at<double>(2);            Mat pix2 = K * proj2 * P;            pix2 /= pix2.at<double>(2);            double d1 = (pix1.at<double>(0) - pixelPtsL[i].x()) * (pix1.at<double>(0) - pixelPtsL[i].x()) + (pix1.at<double>(1) - pixelPtsL[i].y()) * (pix1.at<double>(1) - pixelPtsL[i].y());            double d2 = (pix2.at<double>(0) - pixelPtsR[i].x()) * (pix2.at<double>(0) - pixelPtsR[i].x()) + (pix2.at<double>(1) - pixelPtsR[i].y()) * (pix2.at<double>(1) - pixelPtsR[i].y());            if (d1 > 2 || d2 > 2) //è‹¥åæŠ•å½±åˆ°å½±åƒä¸Šä¸åƒç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»å¤§äº2ä¸ªåƒç´ ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ¤æ–­ä¸ºå¤±é…ç‚¹            {                mask.at<uchar>(i) = 0;                fail_count++;            }        }        if (fail_count > space_pts.size() * 0.8) //80%ä»¥ä¸Šéƒ½å¤±è´¥ è¿”å›0            return 0;        return 1;    }};

(3)åœ¨åŠ¨æ€åº“çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å¼•å…¥åº“ï¼ˆ.LIBï¼‰æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯dllæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¼•å…¥åº“æ–‡ä»¶åŒ…å«è¢«DLLå¯¼å‡ºçš„å‡½æ•°çš„åç§°å’Œä½ç½®ï¼ŒDLLåŒ…å«å®é™…çš„å‡½æ•°å’Œæ•°æ®ï¼Œåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä½¿ç”¨LIBæ–‡ä»¶é“¾æ¥åˆ°æ‰€éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„DLLæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåº“ä¸­çš„å‡½æ•°å’Œæ•°æ®å¹¶ä¸å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºçš„å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œå­˜æ”¾çš„ä¸æ˜¯è¢«è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ä»£ç ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯DLLä¸­æ‰€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å½“ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ˜¯å†æŠŠç¨‹åºä»£ç å’Œè¢«è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ä»£ç é“¾æ¥èµ·æ¥ï¼Œä»è€ŒèŠ‚çœäº†å†…å­˜èµ„æºã€‚ä»ä¸Šé¢çš„è¯´æ˜å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼ŒDLLå’Œ.LIBæ–‡ä»¶å¿…é¡»éšåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸€èµ·å‘è¡Œï¼Œå¦åˆ™åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå°†ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ã€‚

git clone https://github.com/CesiumGS/cesium.git    //æºç ä¸‹è½½npm install    //å®‰è£…cesiumæ‰€éœ€çš„ä¸€äº›ä¾èµ–npm run release    //ä¼šæŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„ä¸œè¥¿å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
